enhanced_description: Pla Pao is a beloved hearty and satisfying main course from central Thailand that with a subtle warmth. Grilled fish in salt crust served with spicy seafood sauce. This medium recipe takes about 40 minutes to prepare and represents the authentic flavors of Central Thai cuisine balances sweet, sour, salty and spicy flavors perfectly. The combination of whole fish, coarse salt, lemongrass creates a harmonious blend that has made this dish a favorite among locals and visitors alike. Perfect for those seeking reasonably priced authentic Thai cuisine.
